filmography.title: Laugh, Clown, Laugh
filmography.role_description: A young foundling raised by a circus clown who becomes the object of his hidden affection as she grows up.
filmography.plot: A circus clown adopts an abandoned girl, but as she matures, he falls in love with her, leading to tragedy.

filmography.title: Platinum Blonde
filmography.role_description: A spunky newspaper reporter who is secretly in love with her colleague, even as he marries a wealthy socialite.
filmography.plot: A snobbish heiress marries a down-to-earth reporter, but their class differences threaten their marriage.

filmography.title: Taxi!
filmography.role_description: A feisty waitress who marries a taxi driver caught in a violent war between independent cabbies and a corrupt trust.
filmography.plot: A diverse group of independent cab drivers must stand together to fight off a ruthless syndicate trying to muscle in on their territory.

filmography.title: Employees' Entrance
filmography.role_description: A desperate young woman who gets a job at a department store but falls under the control of its tyrannical manager.
filmography.plot: A ruthless department store manager uses his power to manipulate the lives of his employees.

filmography.title: Zoo in Budapest
filmography.role_description: An orphan fleeing a strict institution who hides in a zoo and falls in love with a zookeeper.
filmography.plot: A zookeeper who loves animals more than people finds a kindred spirit in a runaway orphan girl hiding in the zoo.

filmography.title: Midnight Mary
filmography.role_description: A woman born into poverty and crime who tries to go straight but is pulled back by her gangster associates.
filmography.plot: A woman on trial for murder recounts her life story, from a difficult childhood to her entanglement with the underworld.

filmography.title: Man's Castle
filmography.role_description: A homeless, starving woman who moves into a shantytown shack with a tough guy, transforming his life with her love.
filmography.plot: A tough, unemployed man takes in a starving woman, and they try to build a life together in a shantytown during the Depression.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Born to Be Bad
filmography.role_description: A manipulative unwed mother who uses her son to extort a wealthy businessman but eventually develops a conscience.
filmography.plot: A young woman schemes to take advantage of the wealthy man who adopted her illegitimate son.

filmography.title: The House of Rothschild
filmography.role_description: The daughter of the banking dynasty who falls in love with a Gentile officer, challenging family tradition.
filmography.plot: The history of the Rothschild banking family, focusing on their rise to power and their struggle against anti-Semitism.

filmography.title: The Call of the Wild
filmography.role_description: A woman searching for her missing husband in the Yukon who falls in love with a prospector played by Clark Gable.
filmography.plot: A prospector sets out for the Klondike Gold Rush with a dog he rescued, encountering adventure and romance along the way.

filmography.title: The Crusades
filmography.role_description: A princess who marries Richard the Lionheart to save her father's kingdom and joins him on his holy quest.
filmography.plot: King Richard the Lionheart leads the Third Crusade to Jerusalem to avoid marrying a French princess, but ends up marrying another.

filmography.title: Ramona
filmography.role_description: A mixed-race orphan in 1870s California who faces prejudice when she elopes with a Native American.
filmography.plot: A young woman of mixed heritage runs away with an Indian to escape her prejudice-filled home.

filmography.title: Café Metropole
filmography.role_description: An American heiress in Paris who is wooed by a broke playboy posing as a Russian prince.
filmography.plot: A playboy who has gambled away his money is forced to pose as a Russian prince to woo a wealthy heiress.

filmography.title: Suez
filmography.role_description: A French aristocrat who loves Ferdinand de Lesseps but marries Napoleon III to become Empress.
filmography.plot: Ferdinand de Lesseps pursues his dream of building a canal through the Egyptian desert to link the Mediterranean and Red Seas.

filmography.title: Kentucky
filmography.role_description: A southern belle caught in a Romeo and Juliet-style family feud over horse racing.
filmography.plot: Two lovers from feuding families are brought together by their shared love of horse racing.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Walter Brennan)

filmography.title: The Story of Alexander Graham Bell
filmography.role_description: The deaf wife of Alexander Graham Bell, whose condition inspires his work on the telephone.
filmography.plot: The biography of the man who invented the telephone and his romance with a deaf woman.

filmography.title: Bedtime Story
filmography.role_description: A stage actress who wants to retire but is tricked by her playwright husband to star in one last show.
filmography.plot: A playwright tries to stop his actress wife from retiring by concocting a fake sob story.

filmography.title: China
filmography.role_description: A dedicated teacher in war-torn China who convinces a cynical oil salesman to help refugees.
filmography.plot: A cynical American oil salesman in China helps a teacher and a group of war orphans escape the Japanese invasion.

filmography.title: And Now Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman who goes deaf and finds hope and romance with a doctor from the wrong side of the tracks.
filmography.plot: A deaf socialite falls for the doctor who is trying to cure her hearing, despite their class differences.

filmography.title: Along Came Jones
filmography.role_description: A tough frontier woman who helps a mild-mannered cowboy mistaken for a notorious outlaw.
filmography.plot: A mild-mannered cowboy is mistaken for a notorious outlaw and is helped by a local girl.

filmography.title: The Stranger
filmography.role_description: A naive woman living in Connecticut who slowly realizes her charming husband is an escaped Nazi war criminal.
filmography.plot: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to a small town to find an infamous Nazi posing as a professor.

filmography.title: The Farmer's Daughter
filmography.role_description: A Swedish-American farm girl who takes a job as a maid for a congressman and ends up running for Congress herself.
filmography.plot: A headstrong farm girl leaves home to become a nurse but ends up working as a maid for a political family and running for office.

filmography.title: The Bishop's Wife
filmography.role_description: The neglected wife of a bishop who finds herself charmed by a suave angel sent to help her husband.
filmography.plot: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop in order to help him build a new cathedral and repair his fractured marriage.

filmography.title: Rachel and the Stranger
filmography.role_description: A bondswoman married to a widower who gains confidence and her husband's love when a charming stranger visits.
filmography.plot: A man treats his bondswoman wife like a servant until a smooth-talking hunter arrives and shows an interest in her.

filmography.title: The Accused
filmography.role_description: A psychology professor who kills a student in self-defense and tries to cover up the crime.
filmography.plot: A professor accidentally kills a student who tries to assault her, then tries to conceal her involvement as police investigate.

filmography.title: Come to the Stable
filmography.role_description: A determined French nun who comes to New England to build a children's hospital.
filmography.plot: Two French nuns arrive in a small New England town with a plan to build a children's hospital, charming the locals.

filmography.title: Key to the City
filmography.role_description: A strait-laced female mayor who clashes and falls in love with a rough-and-tumble ex-longshoreman mayor.
filmography.plot: Two mayors meet at a convention in San Francisco and fall in love despite their differing backgrounds and political views.

filmography.title: Cause for Alarm!
filmography.role_description: A housewife who must retrieve an incriminating letter written by her paranoid husband before it's delivered.
filmography.plot: A woman races against time to retrieve a letter her mentally unstable husband mailed, which falsely accuses her of plotting his murder.

filmography.title: It Happens Every Thursday
filmography.role_description: A city wife who moves to a small town with her husband to run a failing newspaper; Young's final feature film.
filmography.plot: A New York couple buys a small-town weekly newspaper and tries to boost its circulation with gimmicks.
